resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Two dragons swallow doves. While the text refers to the dove as the Holy Spirit, the iconography seems to depict the doves more as the faithful who are devoured by the Devil when they stray from God
resource.chars: Two dragons swallow doves. While the text refers to the dove as the Holy Spirit, the iconography seems to depict the doves more as the faithful who are devoured by the Devil when they stray from God
